title: "Using Self-Hypnosis to Harness the Power of the Unconscious Mind"
first_phrase: This text explores the theory behind the effectiveness of the method of self-hypnosis and how it activates the brain's neural system in a coherent way. The author emphasizes the philosophy of working with the unconscious mind and how it can be leveraged to achieve better results. The last 200 tokens describe the three fundamental phases necessary for effective self-hypnosis, the importance of creating a concentration of thought, and the methods to make the subconscious mind work. These include visualizing success in the morning and focusing on a specific thought in the evening. The author concludes by reminding readers that the mind goes towards what it knows, and one must make it know what they want.

last_phrase: In conclusion, using self-hypnosis techniques can help us achieve our goals by tapping into the power of our unconscious mind. By setting clear objectives and visualizing success, we can work on creating new associations and ideas, while also understanding the different stages of mental transformation aided by the use of light and brain waves. Let's dare to dream and unlock the potential of our minds!
